title: ClimateWise
subtitle: Weather App – Conditional Fetch, Custom Hook, Shared State
description: A React weather application featuring a reusable custom fetch hook, conditional API requests, and dynamic UI updates based on real-time weather data. Includes history-based re-fetching and adaptive backgrounds, demonstrating advanced state management and asynchronous data handling.

title: CineMate
subtitle: Movie Database App – Favorites Management, State Handling, Dynamic UI
description: A React movie database application allowing users to browse movies, mark favorites, and manage a personalized watchlist. Built to strengthen skills in state management, conditional rendering, and modular component architecture.

title: New York Times Best Sellers
subtitle: Books App – Controlled Inputs, List Rendering, State Management
description: An interactive React application that allows users to add, track, and manage a personal collection of books. Built to practice controlled components, dynamic list rendering, and efficient state-driven UI updates.
